byline.original: By SUSANNE CRAIG and KEVIN ROOSE

abstract: The Keefe Bruyette & Woods chairman and chief executive, John G. Duffy, has prostate cancer and is retiring early. The firm, meanwhile, reported a $15 million loss for the third quarter.
snippet: The Keefe Bruyette & Woods chairman and chief executive, John G. Duffy, has prostate cancer and is retiring early. The firm, meanwhile, reported a $15 million loss for the third quarter.

headline.main: Keefe Bruyette Chief Steps Down as Firm Posts Loss
